short_summary: Temporary Help Services for Department of National Defense
description: This is a requirement for Temporary Help Services. Department of National Defense has  issued a Request for Proposal.
full_summary:
# Job Opportunity - Special Advisor

## Government Tender Announcement

### Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking a Special Advisor under a Request for Proposal (RFP) against the Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870. This opportunity is open to eligible suppliers who are holders of the specified SA and have been pre-qualified through the Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS).

### Job Description

The DND requires a Special Advisor to provide temporary help services. The selected supplier will be required to provide a consultant with a Secret security level to support the department's needs.

### Eligibility

To be eligible for this opportunity, suppliers must be registered holders of the Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870 and qualified under the following streams and categories:

* Stream 13.9 - Special Advisor

### Invitation to Tender

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Calian Ltd.
* DBHS Security Consulting Inc
* Elevated Thinking Inc.
* GovInsights Consulting Inc.
* Le Groupe Conseil Bronson Consulting Group
* MGIS Inc. & iGeoSpy Inc. in JV
* Northern Brainwaves Consulting Inc.
* Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
* PrecisionIT Incorporated
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* Thinkpoint Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.

### Tender Submission

Prospective suppliers must submit their proposals in accordance with the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document. The complete document can be accessed through the following link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22621/s4663136--rfp-%28english-version_1.pdf

### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: October 27, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Contract start date: Not specified
* Contract end date: Not specified

### Contact Information

For more information regarding this opportunity, please contact:

CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
613971–795
